Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
com::diag::amigo::DisplayThis pure (abstract) class defines the interface that the LC100 software expects to be implemented by any display that it uses
com::diag::amigo::LC100< _COLS_, _ROWS_ >This is the derived (sub) class for the LC100 software that contains the actual data structures whose sizes depend on the actual size of the display
com::diag::amigo::LC100BaseThis is the common base (super) class for the LC100 software that does all of the heavy lifting for any LC100 template instantiation regardless of the display dimensions
MockThis is a mock display that merely traces itself on the serial output and implements the movement keys used by the visual editor (vi)
